json.title: n8n Tutorial for Beginners - Build Your First Free AI Agent
json.text:
This n8n tutorial shows you how to build your first AI agentâ€”totally free and without needing to know how to code.
ğŸŒ [Sponsor] Check out QuickBooks Online âœ https://quickbooks.kevinstratvert.com/

First, youâ€™ll learn what makes an AI agent different from a simple workflow or chatbot, so you can start thinking like a builder, not just a user.

Next, youâ€™ll get hands-on with n8n, an open-source automation platform that combines drag-and-drop power with AI reasoning and tool access.

Then, Iâ€™ll walk you step-by-step through installing n8n locally using Docker and show how to create your first automation, all for free.

After that, weâ€™ll build a real AI agent that connects to Gemini, reads overdue invoices from QuickBooks, and drafts personalized email reminders to customers.

Youâ€™ll also learn how to write better prompts for your agents using a framework that blends Role, Task, Tools, and Output to get the most reliable behavior.

Next, youâ€™ll see how to test, troubleshoot, and inspect your AI agentâ€™s behaviorâ€”down to every message it sendsâ€”so you stay in control.

Finally, weâ€™ll go one level deeper by adding a â€œHuman in the Loopâ€ approval step via Discord, giving you final review power before anything goes out.

Host: David DeWinter
Sponsor: Intuit
 
ğŸ“š RESOURCES
Docker Desktop âœ https://www.docker.com/products/docke...
Google AI Studio (Gemini API Key) âœ https://aistudio.google.com
Gemini API Limits âœ https://ai.google.dev/gemini-api/docs...
Gmail App Password âœ http://security.google.com âœ Search for App Password 

ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’» COMMANDS
docker volume create n8n_data
docker run -it --rm --name n8n -p 5678:5678 -v n8n_data:/home/node/.n8n docker.n8n.io/n8nio/n8n

For n8n Loop:
{{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.propertyName }}


âŒš TIMESTAMPS
00:00 - Intro
00:32 - What is an AI Agent?
01:48 - n8n Free Setup
04:02 - Your First Agent
15:58 - Human in the Loop
22:51 - Wrap-up

ğŸ’¬ PROMPTS
Help me write a prompt for an AI Agent using the key components: Role, Task, Input, Tools, and Outputs. I'll write a brief below, but ask me any questions you need answers to write the final prompt.

Task
To draft an send late payment messages to customers who have not yet paid their invoices in QuickBooks Online yet and are past due.

Context
Agent should be polite when customers are under 7 days overdue, but as the weeks go by, the agent should become more and more firm. The agent should make its own subject and message for each customer.

Tools
You have access to the following tools:
'getInvoices(query)': Gets all invoices. Include "WHERE DueDate (insert less than symbol) â€˜[Today]â€™" in the query string as the "query" parameter to get invoices that are overdue.
'sendPaymentReminder(customerEmail, subject, message)': Sends an email with a model-defined subject and message to the customer.

Outputs
Return a summary of how many emails were sent in JSON. For each email, write the customer's name, the amount of the invoice, how many days overdue they were, the subject of the email, and the body of the email.
----
To get ChatGPT to ask you questions to clarify the role of your agent:
Ask me questions to clarify any ambiguity in how the agent needs to behave.
----
To get ChatGPT to output the prompt so you can copy and paste it:
Output this entire prompt as a markdown file, making sure to escape any code sections so it can be copied.

Get the latest high-quality tutorial and tips and tricks videos emailed to your inbox each week: https://kevinstratvert.com/newsletter/

ğŸ TOOLS AND DISCOUNTS

Welcome to the most comprehensive free course on AI automation and AI agents for beginners using n8n. 

In this 8+ hour deep-dive, Iâ€™ll walk you step-by-step through what you need to go from complete beginner to building and selling real AI-powered automations, no coding required. 

Weâ€™ll cover what AI agents are, why theyâ€™re a smart investment right now, and how to use n8n to build powerful workflows with a free two-week trial. 

Youâ€™ll learn n8n foundations, how to set up APIs and HTTP requests, and how to use tools like agent memory, multi-agent systems, and prompting to create scalable systems. 

Weâ€™ll also explore essential concepts like webhooks, MCP servers, and self-hosting, plus a ton of advanced strategies packed into easy-to-follow lessons. 

By the end of this course, youâ€™ll have built over 15 working AI automations that you can use or sell. This video is insanely value-packed, so make sure to save it and come back to it whenever you hit a roadblock. 

If youâ€™re serious about mastering AI agents and automation, this course is the only one youâ€™ll need.

json.text:

Take advantage of the early BlackFriday Discounts: 24mo for $6.49 (-64% OFF)

I go step by step to show how I build an AI agent from scratch using N8N. This is my simple way to automate email replies with AI, without writing any code. I walk you through how N8N works, how to self-host it with Hostinger to save money and keep your data private, and how to set up AI models like OpenAI inside your workflows. 

I also show how to use triggers, nodes, and even add memory and tools to make your automation smarter. This helps me handle support emails faster and lets me set up agents that do way more than just reply. Everything is explained clearly, and youâ€™ll see how to test, fix errors, and add new steps like sending urgent messages to your team.
